page.title: 11Events Droxford,Plants,Red+
page.content: Our friend opened her garden to the public.The Red Cross asked her to support them.Houses in{Droxford}with lovely gardens take turns.Roses,del_ phiniums,carnations,pansies,poppies, foxgloves bloomed.Â£310 was raised.She was amazed how many people came.At Harvest,Christmas,Easter and flower festivals the villagers decorate the church.Since the last century the Meon valley flower show has exhibited flowers,fruit and vegetables.On 7 Sept in huge marquee on{Droxford}"Rec" there will be keen competition. Chrysanthemums are a speciality.Also cookery,handicrafts and childrens competitions.Local WI and Meon Valley Beekepers compete.There is also an Exemption Dog Show.Floral art group meet in village hall monthly.Methodist chapel now a florist garden centre and secondhand shop.
